attributes.additional_details:
To have Dungeness returned to the list of sites approved for the building of a new nuclear power station.
With the closure of Dungeness A, and the limited life of Dungeness B, it is vital to the economy of the local area that a new nuclear power station be approved and built at Dungeness.
This will provide long term jobs for locals and provide vital income for the Marsh area, while supporting the current plans for nuclear power generation within the UK, and allow utilisation of the existing infrastructure.
